article_title: No unions for workers in home health
article_text:
Total Access

article_metadata.description: Gov. John Kasich has ended the ability of Ohio home health-care and in-home child-care workers to collectively bargain as part of a union, arguing that it’s no longer necessary because Obamacare and Medicaid have made health care more accessible.
